title: Nike Mercurial Vapor 16 Elite 'Vini Jr.'
description: As Vini Jr. flies over the pitch at blinding speeds, Mercurial lifts him to new heights. The gradient design of his Vapor 16 Elite blends colours from his debut club to the Brazil national teamâ€”where he started and where he's going. With bouncy Air Zoom cushioning, a new traction plate and revolutionary Gripknit, it unlocks his explosive acceleration into the future.
